content.description:
The temperature outside a house during a 24-hour period is given by

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>F</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>80</mn> <mo>−</mo> <mn>10</mn> <mtext> cos</mtext> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>π</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>12</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>,</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mn>0</mn> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>24</mn> <mo>,</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGgbWdamaabmaabaWdbiaadshaa8aacaGLOaGaayzkaaWdbiab g2da9iaaiIdacaaIWaGaeyOeI0IaaGymaiaaicdacaqGGaGaae4yai aab+gacaqGZbWaaeWaaeaadaWcaaqaaiabec8aWjaadshaaeaacaaI XaGaaGOmaaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGGSaGaaeiiaiaaicdacaqGGa GaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaikdacaaI0aGaaiilaaaa@50F9@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

where F(t) is measured in degrees Fahrenheit and t is measured in hours.
content.question: Find the average temperature, to the nearest degree Fahrenheit, between t = 6 and t = 14.

frqParts.text: Find the average temperature, to the nearest degree Fahrenheit, between t = 6 and t = 14.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval
